title: Replace time/day dropdowns with hour selector and day-of-month input in contact form

requirements.text: In the ContactSection component (frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx), replace the bestTimeToContact dropdown field with an hour selector that allows clients to choose a specific hour throughout the day in 12-hour format (1:00 AM, 2:00 AM, ..., 11:00 AM, 12:00 PM, 1:00 PM, ..., 11:00 PM, 12:00 AM) or 24-hour format (00:00 through 23:00)

quotes: At the form at the bottom of the website where the best time to contact give the client the option of selecting a specific time throughout the day a specific hour

acceptanceCriteria: The bestTimeToContact field displays as a dropdown or select input with hourly time options
All 24 hours of the day are available as selection options
The selected hour value is captured in the form state
The field is positioned where the current bestTimeToContact dropdown exists in the form

requirements.text: In the ContactSection component (frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx), replace the bestDayToContact dropdown field with a day-of-month input that allows clients to enter or select a specific day of the month (1-31)

quotes: where the best day to contact give an option to where the client can actually fill in a specific day out of the month

acceptanceCriteria: The bestDayToContact field displays as either a number input or dropdown with values 1-31
The selected day value is captured in the form state
The field is positioned where the current bestDayToContact dropdown exists in the form
Input validation ensures only valid day numbers (1-31) can be entered

requirements.text: Update the useSubmitContactForm mutation hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to submit the new bestTimeToContact value (specific hour format) and bestDayToContact value (day of month number) to the backend
acceptanceCriteria: The mutation correctly maps the hour selector value to bestTimeToContact field
The mutation correctly maps the day-of-month value to bestDayToContact field
Form submission successfully saves the new time and day format to the backend

requirements.text: Update the admin panel submissions table in frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx to display the bestTimeToContact column showing the specific hour format and the bestDayToContact column showing the day of month number in a readable format
acceptanceCriteria: The bestTimeToContact column displays the hour in a human-readable format (e.g., '2:00 PM' or '14:00')
The bestDayToContact column displays the day number (e.g., '15' or 'Day 15')
Both columns are visible in the submissions table
The data displays correctly for all existing and new submissions

constraints: Do not modify the backend ContactFormSubmission type structure - it already uses Text fields that can accommodate these new formats
Preserve all other contact form fields and their current functionality
Maintain the existing form validation and submission flow
nonGoals: Changing the backend data model or migration logic
Modifying any other sections of the website beyond the contact form and admin panel
Adding date picker libraries or complex calendar widgets
